author: plynch
msg: o many improvements to the Windows batch file - a complete rewrite
o issue MAVEN-135 ( MAVEN-129 ) resolved
o add '@' to all REM statements so they don't print when MAVEN_BATCH_ECHO=on
o ECHO --> MAVEN_BATCH_ECHO
o PAUSE --> MAVEN_BATCH_PAUSE
o all variables defined are reset to nothing upon exit of script for win 98/ME
o detection for not set MAVEN_HOME and JAVA_HOME
o detection for invalidly set MAVEN_HOME and JAVA_HOME
o correctly determine a missing directory for MAVEN_HOME and JAVA_HOME
o integrating latest changes from dIon's commits to resolve xml issues
o added logic to call a user's %HOME%\mavenpre_rc.bat and mavenpost_rc.bat if they exist

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Adding spanish messages.
